name: Hat of Happy Thoughts
description: A hat that provides thoughts of happiness and encouragment when you are feeling down.

name: Wand of Wonder
description: A wand that can cast a random spell from a list of 100 spells.
requirements: Level 4 or higher of any spellcasting class

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A cloak that makes the wearer invisible to the naked eye.

name: Bag of Holding
description: A bag that can hold an infinite amount of items, but only weighs 5 pounds.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: A ring that can regenerate any wound or lost limb.

name: Amulet of the Planes
description: An amulet that allows the wearer to travel to any plane of existence.

name: Elixer of Health
description: A potion that can heal any wound or disease.
